The lit bug lantern is an item used in the Slayer skill. It requires level 33 Slayer to wield and must be equipped in order to fight Harpie Bug Swarms.

Level 33 Firemaking and a tinderbox are required to light the unlit lantern. Bug lanterns are worn in the shield slot, but only lit lanterns are effective against Harpie Bug Swarms for completing slayer tasks.

Only the extinguished lantern is tradeable. The version purchased from Slayer masters is unlit by default.

The bug lantern does not qualify as a light source, however it does count as warm clothing while fighting Wintertodt.

The '''lit bug lantern''' is an item used in the [[Slayer]] skill. It requires level 33 Slayer to wield and must be equipped in order to fight [[Harpie Bug Swarm]]s.

Level 33 [[Firemaking]] and a [[tinderbox]] are required to light the unlit lantern. Bug lanterns are worn in the [[shield slot]], but only lit lanterns are effective against Harpie Bug Swarms for completing slayer tasks.

Only the extinguished lantern is tradeable. The version purchased from [[Slayer master]]s is unlit by default.

The bug lantern does not qualify as a [[light source]], however it does count as [[Wintertodt/Warm clothing|warm clothing]] while fighting [[Wintertodt]].
